name: Airplane Games For Toddlers! sounds & puzzles and matching game for little boys and girls
name_original: Airplane Games For Toddlers! sounds & puzzles and matching game for little boys and girls
description:
Airplane Game For Toddler!- Is your little pilot a big lover of airplane? If so, he or she is sure to love all of the airplane found in the Airplane Games and Sounds app. This exciting activity app is filled with engaging airplane, helicopter and other aircraft sounds your little pilot can explore...but the Airplane Games For Kids doesn't end there. The activity app also comes with a Funny Airplane Match Game, and a Beautiful, Real Airplane! Puzzle Game for Kids.

Designed for 2 years & up. Gameplay is very simple and suited for younger children - when the sound of a aircraft is played your kid needs to touch on a friendly picture of a correct plane.

Main features:
- Real, high quality sounds of aircrafts,
- 5 Cool Memory games of airplanes and helicopters
- 7 Beautiful and funny puzzles for 3 difficulty level
- WITHOUT disturbing Ads. This is a paid app, support development of future updates and new games for kids.

Includes Airplane Game For Toddler of the following aircrafts:
* Jet
* Passenger Plane
* Helicopter
* Propeller plane
* Hot Air Ballon
* Space ship
* Bat
* Satellite

Another amazingly cool feature to the Aircrafts Game For Kids makes it even more awesome then just matching- your little cop must find the icons that link for their match choices! And when they do make a linked match the little flying game shows them the link. This important element, and the matching itself, provides a real educational bonus and playing Airplane Game For Toddler! Sounds & Puzzles also promotes:
-Fine motor skills.
-Memory and recognition skills.
-Hand eye coordination.
-Early math concepts.
-Airplane knowledge

This application is under active development, we always welcome your suggestion to improve "airplane sounds and puzzles" application.
Please send us email on appkeszito101 [-at-] gmail.com

Don't wait! Download now and enjoy!
